description: Enable AI assistants and applications to seamlessly interact with cross-chain blockchain infrastructure. Access comprehensive token data, bridging tools, transaction tracking, and gas price information through a standardized protocol. Simplify cross-chain operations and enhance blockchain interoperability within your AI workflows.

lifiApiKey.description: API key for LI.FI API authentication

capabilities.name: lifi_get_chains
capabilities.description: Get information about all currently supported chains from LI.FI API

capabilities.name: lifi_get_tokens
capabilities.description: Get information about all supported tokens from LI.FI API

capabilities.name: lifi_get_token
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific token from LI.FI API

capabilities.name: lifi_get_tools
capabilities.description: Get information about all supported tools (bridges and exchanges) from LI.FI API

capabilities.name: lifi_get_connections
capabilities.description: Get information about supported chain connections from LI.FI API

capabilities.name: lifi_get_gas_prices
capabilities.description: Get gas price information for a specific chain from LI.FI API

capabilities.name: lifi_get_gas_suggestion
capabilities.description: Get gas amount suggestions for a specific chain from LI.FI API

capabilities.name: lifi_get_transaction_status
capabilities.description: Get the status of a cross-chain transfer by transaction hash from LI.FI API

capabilities.name: lifi_get_integrator_fee_withdrawal
capabilities.description: Get integrator fee withdrawal transaction for a specific chain from LI.FI API
